history.development: Walked at 14 months, spoke first words around age 2. No major medical issues.
history.education: Currently in 2nd grade. Teacher reports difficulties with attention and reading fluency.

concerns: Struggles to stay focused at home and school.

observations.classroom: Student required frequent redirection, lost focus during independent work, and showed signs of frustration with reading tasks.
observations.testing: Worked hard throughout the assessment but needed repeated repetition of instructions and breaks between subtests.
